c74object.name: az.holo.rectangle
c74object.digest: Arrange speakers on a rectangle path with orientation
c74object.description: az.holo.rectangle Arrange speakers on a rectangle path with orientation, can be used to connect directly to HOLOPHONIX Software.

attribute.name: initwith
attribute.description:
The initwith attribute can be used to specify the initial state of the object. You should provide a list of comma-separated OSC commands. The list of messages should be quoted (with double quote character "). This is similar to sending the list of commands via loadbang or loadmess.
Have a look at the spat5.tuto-osc-3.maxpat example for further details.
Note that the initwith attribute cannot be set via message, attrui or inspector; it must be typed directly within the object box.

method.name: /with
method.description: set the width of the rectangle path on the x axis.

method.name: /length
method.description: set the length of the rectangle path on the y axis.

method.name: /speaker/number
method.description: set the number of speaker to distribute along the rectangle path.
method.digest: set the number of speaker to distribute along the rectangle path

method.name: /offset
method.description: offset distributed speakers along the path of the rectangle in meters.
method.digest: offset distributed speakers along the path of the rectangle in meters

method.name: /index
method.description: choose the beginning OSC index of the list of speakers.
method.digest: choose the beginning OSC index of the list of speakers
